definition[0]: to damage the surface of the ground, especially by walking on it or driving a vehicle over it
example[0]: The lawn had been churned up by the tractor.
definition[1]: to move water, mud etc around violently
example[1]: The oars had churned up the mud, clouding the water.
definition[2]: to make someone upset or angry
example[2]: Though she looked calm, in reality she was churned up inside.
